content.detailedDescription: At 11:50 p.M. i stepped on the front porch to have a smoke under an umbrella. no stars were visible due to complete cloud cover and rain. i observed a shining oval/sphere shaped object hovering above some trees for about 20 second, then it disappeared. it seemed very close. this has been happening here for several months now, but this is the first time i have reported it. my brother has observed this with me before. i have no photos but will be on the ready from now on. this is getting interesting.
content.summary: Stepped on porch and observed a bright sphere shape above trees.

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i were taking our dog out for a walk, when i noticed an object up in the sky flying from sw to ne. it was star-like and flashing and traveling at a very high rate of speed. there was a plane flying in the opposite direction, and at a much lower altitude. this plane was very slow in comparison to the star-like object. it continued to move at a high rate speed until we lost sight of it. it either disappeared or went behind some high altitude clouds. this happened in the matter of a couple seconds.

about five minutes later, we were just finishing up our walk, when we noticed another star-like object traveling across the sky. this object was moving south to north in the northern sky. this object did not flash, was not quite as bright, and moved at a much slower speed than the first object (from where we perceived it). the object appeared to slightly change direction, but went along a generally strait path. we watched it for about 30 seconds until it faded out in the distance.

then, about three minutes after that we noticed an orange light traveling in the western sky, from north to south. this object seemed to be at a much lower altitude compared to the other two objects. this object traveled in a generally strait direction but it did appear to slightly change direction at times. it also changed speed, sometimes slowing down then speeding back up. we watched it for about 40 seconds, until it disappeared, possibly behind some clouds.

yesterday 3/08/10, approx 10:30pm, i saw a red light in the sky traveling north to south in the same general area at the first object we saw today. i saw it for about 2 seconds until it disappeared. i wasn't going to report it, but after the sightings today i felt like it should be noted. 

we both are avid sky watchers. satellites are not typically visible in our area due to light pollution. we don't think that these were satellites. we wanted to file a report because these were unusual, and the skies seemed to be more active.
content.summary: 3 objects seen within a 15 minute span.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down i-26, when i saw what appeared to be two headlights in the sky, a third red one.  it moved slowly, fly close to tree level.  when it got nearly above me, i could not see an out line of the plane.  these head lights turned out to be a diamond shape craft with four white lights on each corner.  the vaguely remember the red lights location. i slowed to the minimum speed and rolled down my window to make sure my eyes weren't tricking me.  this was the second time i've seen a ufo in charleston, so upon the first moments i felt fear that they were back, yet exclusiveness to the situations a lot of people don't witness.. it moved south west disappearing into the fog.
content.summary: Oval shaped object with 4 lights, and one red light.

content.detailedDescription: Information in document
content.summary: 100's of objects seen

content.detailedDescription:
I was out smoking on the steps watching some planes. i look of to my right and bamb, there was a huge fiery ball, which looked like a cherry off a cigarette. it was about 500' the most about a quarter of a mile away. i ran in to get my binoculars to see what it was. i seen attached to this light was a translusent body which looked like a half diamond. i go back in the house and tell my wife to look out the window, theres a ufo. she said, thats not a ufo. then as it was moving to slow twards the north. she wanted to go out side and watch it. she also seen the translucent body. then it got to where it was parallel to us straight to our west, hovers lets us watch it, then shoots up till it looked like a star. goes east for about a mile blinking its fiery ball on and off. turns north for a short distance then turns off the fireball and all you could see was its translucent body as it starts to fall very fast spinning and changing shape to what apeard to be a raindrop. get this. then it swoops twards us, like a bull would very fast. right then my wife trys to pull me in but im just watching it. she starts crying and just then it just drops down below my nahbors mobilhome which is about 15' the most. after that no bangs booms or flashes. it took place around 2 hours. i watched it pretty much the hole tim with my bino's.

1)i was smoking.

2)i was watching planes and stars.

3)i just thought it was a low flying plane.

4)a half diamond that was translucent with its fiery ball off light under it. came close to us, waited, then shot up high in the sky to what seemed about 35,000 or more feet. traveled a little then dropped, spinning, changing shape, then swooping at us, then to what seemed as if it did a quick ducked as if hiding from my wife freaking out.

5)i was at an awe, drawn to it. i just wanted to watch it.

6)i lost it over my nahbors house.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It was close, then shot up. went out then came back.

content.detailedDescription:
early april 2010 i was at my parents home in jackson michigan. just before dusk my father and i went outside to the front deck to have a smoke. we stood on the deck for about five or ten minutes having a normal conversation consisting of everyday occurances that a father and son would converse about sports, news, current events etc. i dont recall the exact context of our conversation when suddenly i happened to look in my father's direction (north) and i saw what first appeared to be a firework of some kind. noticing that the object in question was moving parallel to the ground rather than ascending upward like fireworks i stopped my father in mid sentence and said what the $#@! is that. to our astonishment we saw a orange and red circular object about 400 feet in the air and about 500-600 yards away. having lived in the home which was about five miles away from reynolds airfield ten years before starting a family of my own, we were accustomed to seeing various types of aircraft in the skies all throughout the day and night. my father's reaction was quite that of mine with many explitives spouted out in curiousity. if i had to guess the speed of the object, i would estimate that it was traveling about 60-80 miles per hour. the speed is purely a guess as i have little or no knowledge of aviation. we watched the object for what seemed like hours anticipating a closer view. the flight path of the object was going to bring right overhead. it then abruptly stopped about 200 yards away and turned with tremendous acceleration heading east almost all in one motion. feeling a little disappointed the object changed flight paths we stood in utter amazement the object could perform such a maneuver. by this time my fiance, mother and brother were on the deck wondering what we were looking at so admirably. they too seen the object though by this time it was significantly smaller and farther away. amidst all the comotion my brother grabbed a plastic telescope which was intened for a child's toy. i tried vigorously to pick the object up in the lense but excited and a little frightened from what i had witnessed i did not have the steady hand required to perform such a task. the object stayed in sight for about a half an hour seemingly sitting still at a higher altitude than before. everyone else eventually lost the object among the cluster of stars that filled the night sky as it was a clear night. i stared at it for another five or so minutes before it vanished as if someone simply flipped a light switch. 
    the next few days and weeks i could not think about anything else other than the encounter. i have been interested in the topic of ufos and other intelligences in the universe since a young age but never dreamed i would experience such an encounter. i'm not claiming the object was other worldly nor am i disclaiming the idea all i know is i had never seen anything like it before or since. the validity of the object's origin may never be known. i never heard of anyone else witnessing the event nor really talked of it until now...
content.summary: Orange and red circular object moving south then abruptly changing direction heading east staying in sight as far as 30 miles away

content.detailedDescription:
At around 7:45 on march 8, 2011 around 9 miles south of stephenville, texas, a relative told me to come outside because he had seen something ufo-like in the sky, specifically amber flashes of light. i went outside and waited. at first there was nothing to be seen, but after five minutes or so i too saw a flash of amber light towards comanche that disappeared in, quite literally, a blink of an eye. that peaked my interest so i stayed. then around four-five minutes later multiple flashes of amber colored light could be seen descending in a step light pattern. there were about six flashes of light that vanished in a few seconds. the lights origanted towards the south and ended towards the north. we live in an area prone to fighter jets so i assumed they were flares of some sort.

then (by my estimation around 6 minutes later) two lights appeared in the sky, they were coming from around stephenville. they were blinking, and i couldn't tell if they were representative of one craft with two lights (one at either end), or two crafts with one light a piece, but they did remain at a fixed distance and moved at the same speed. it looked to be a few hundred yards across. it moved slow enough that i could easily see it across the sky, unlike the fighter jets that seemed to be following it. 

the unknown craft(s)then made a pass towards comanche, seemed to make a turn and headed back. i should also note that the craft(s) were wholly silent.

as it was heading towards stephenville the relative i was with pointed towards the trees directly towards the north of us. above the line of trees, a few hundred feet up, was an orb-like "thing" that seemed to be moving in circles. it was a bit hard to see because it gave off no light. that was far more disconcering to be than the previous sighting of the craft(s) with the light because had it not been pointed out i would have had no way of knowing it was there, because it was also silent. i saw it twice in the span of about two minutes. 

the craft(s) with the light then came back into sight and moved back towards comanche. as usual, it was followed by the low rumble of jet fighters. it then disappeared and i did not see anymore of it, though the jets continued to be heard for some time after (which in and of itself is not uncommon for where we live).

i would have loved to document this (especially the rather creepy orb thing) but my phone's screen is cracked and isn't good for much of anything at the moment. 

ps: i put down the sightings lasted about five minutes total, but there were gaps of time between each sighting.
content.summary: Multiple ufo sightings, hico, tx

content.detailedDescription: This incident is being reported by investigator beverly trout.  in july, 1964, two teenagers sprawled in grass in yard saw disk move to 50-75 feet above house, and shine a very bright white light on them.  reporting witness found himself staring into solid-black eyes, which he wanted to think were his buddy's eyes.  when he looked at grass it had tinselly look.  in other words, things looked weird, not natural.  when next he became aware, both he and his buddy were now standing, not sprawled, at a different location in the yard. they did not check the time when the incident was over.  both witnesses found themselves very silent about this case for a number of years.  (((see the investigation report by investigator trout for more detail)))
content.summary: Disk hovered at 50-75 feet above house & shown light around 2 teenage boys

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a ufo that evening when i took a quick break from gaming.
i got a glass of cola, and always like to look out of the window,
it calms me as i gaze into the stars.

but this time something very unexpected happened
i noticed one light popping up slowly moving to the west,
and behind that popped up another one.

they had a length of distance at between... 300 to 350 meters,
and were moving at the same pace.

randomly the back one would slow down or stop frequently.
and then the front one would stop so the back one could catch up.

if anyone has seen the same as me...
please email me, cause this sighting leaved me very
freaked out and confused.

( i tried to film it, but as i pressed the record button it said no memory unit, left it on my desk >_< )
content.summary: Two lights moving together near my house

content.detailedDescription:
I lived in an apartment in richmond, b.C. on the ground floor, and on the edge of steveston park.  i was taking my little dog for his evening walk (approx: 8:30-9:00).  it was a very clear evening and we did our usual stroll around the building and back to the patio entrance to my apartment.  something caught my eye and i looked up to see 5 or 6 big white blobs sailing over our three story building travelling west to east.  i ran into my apartment and then back out again to call my neighbour, stan.  all the time i was talking to my dog saying "henry, what am i seeing?"  realizing the event would be over before i could get stan's attention, i stood and watched them sail across the park and off into the distance.  they did not appear to be flying in any formation and appeared somewhat oval in shape, there was no sound coming from them.  i felt very strange, and it scared the hell out of me.  my apartment was quite close to the vancouver international airport, so needless to say, i was familiar with planes flying overhead, and these, in no way, resembled any aircraft i had ever seen.  i called the airport, university of b.C., and a university in washington state.  no one seemed to be of any assistance, or terribly interested.  the university in washington, however, did ask me to draw a picture of what i had seen and send it to them, which i did.  i never heard another word regarding the matter.  i called my grandson to tell him what i had just seen and to ask who i should contact. he told me he was listening to a report on the radio of strange lights sighted in pheonix, arizona at the same time i was watching the objects.

in the province newspaper the following day there was a small picture someone had taken from their balconly in vancouver.   i have been unable to find anymore information on this picture,  no one at the paper seems able to help me find the article, and at 86 years old, i am not able to get to the vancouver public library to check the archives for the photo.   
this was a breathtaking, yet scary incident.  seeing shows about ufo's on tv still provokes a strange feeling, and my daughter suggested i share this story, as it has bewildered me for so long, but is never far from my mind.  it is so difficult to explain to people what occurred that night and the feelings that come with the experience.  i would like some validation about this incident, but can't seem to find any.
content.summary: I was walking my dog in the evening when i noticed a group of  strange lights moving from west to east overhead.

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling from the city of geneva,ny going south on rte 96 towards the hamlet of willard ny.I was near sampson state park and the now former seneca army depot when i noticed a very bright light to the north west of my location.The light was coming across seneca lake traveling at a high rate of speed. the light continued across the sky now moving west to east then abruptly changed direction and moving now in a north east direction towards the water tank located at 5 points correctional facility.The light continued to travel at a high rate of speed in this direction until i could no longer view it.There were no indications to me this was an aircraft,military or otherwise.There were no other visable marker lights as there would be with private,commercial or military aircraft...I had stopped my vehicle initially just south of kennedy road then proceeded to the entrance to sampson state park where i further observed this bright light.I initially thought this was some type of aircraft but was moving way to fast and the light was too bright. i was not able to make out any shapes or hear any noises.This was just something very different.I was scared to say the least. i called my wife on my cell to explain what i observed.I did not even think to try to video tape this.This event caught me off guard. that and the fact i was talking on the phone to my wife at the time as well
content.summary: Bright light(star like) moving high rate of speed across the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting down outside my house in the porch with a friend. i looked up at the sky and saw a light over head this medical building that is located next to where i live. i got up  because i thought it was strange to see that it was getting brighter.  it looked like it was getting closer but it wasn't so at that moment i see a plane. i knew it wasn't a plane or helicopter  also it was stationed in the air not moving at all .Then it started to dim and disappeared. as soon as it was over i was shocked an couldn't believe what i saw  so i called my friend to come over where i was standing. i told him what happened and he just  said yeah right  your seeing things.   but to our suprise another one came out next to where the other one was at and did the same thing the other light did.   now both of us are shocked  and excited  and after a  half an hour planes high high up in the sky started to show up around that area  .
content.summary: 4 times the brightes star in the sky

content.detailedDescription: It was about 12noon to 12:30 in antelope, ca. i was in my backyard playing with my kids. my 3 year old son noticed a beautiful hawk circling above us. as we admired this majestic hawk my son had pointed to the right of it and asked "what's that dot?" i looked up and automatically thought it was a ufo and not a balloon as it was not moving upwards. it was whitish gray with no lights that moved from left to right in a perfect stright line. we watched/followed it for about a minute as it moved in the sky and disappered into a sparse cloud. my son was quite disappointed when he could no longer find/see this object of fascination. he had described it to dad so perfectly when he asked "where did the golfball in the sky go?" i was in total shock as my son and i just witnessed our first ufo!
content.summary: A whitish gray object moving in sky that disappered into clouds

content.detailedDescription:
We were walking the dog and returning home tonight.  very clear night in long beach so kind of bright city lights but crescent moon so darker than usual.  my friend dmitri noticed what he thought was a satellite and i looked and thought it looked way too close & too bright to be a satellite.  i kept looking for flashing lights and listening for a noise but heard nothing (fully expecting it to be a helicopter or something i could identify).  the object moved like a plane in flight path at first for about 5 seconds, then started to slowly swerve left & right sort of like a balloon would move.  then it got fainter and fainter (quickly 4 sec before it went from it's full brightness to disappearing) until i couldn't see it anymore.  it was difficult to determine whether it was moving upward and thus getting fainter or if the light was just getting dimmer like a flash light does when the batteries die.    

i got excited and then thought this is nuts it cannot be.  then i wondered maybe some else saw it besides my friend and me.  i decided to report it so if someone else saw it and saw it was reported they might report what they saw.  i always thought that if i saw something i could call a ufo it would be really obviously a ufo.  this was just something in the sky that i absolutely cannot identify.
content.summary: Looked like jupiter (brightness) moving slowly & irregularly then got fainter & fainter & disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
My buddy just called me to tell me he saw a ufo in hico tx the size of two football fields, with lights that cycled on and off from left to right.
he said they were unloading something from the back of his pickup truck and they looked towards the west and seen this object coming straight at them. they kept looking at the object for about 30 seconds then the lights went out and then shorlty after two helicopters were flying around like looking for someone/something.
content.summary: Large ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my back porch when i noticed what appeared to be a large star where none should be. i stared at it, as it appeared to be in an air traffic lane (2 planes were passing it at the time). it stayed relatively in one place, moving a little, randomly. it seemed to flicker, with red. after about 20 minutes, first one, and then another, similar light appeared, moving from roughly south to north, disappearing within a minute or two. after another maybe 5 minutes the first light moved a bit south and has been very slowly either getting smaller or moving away. it can still be seen.
content.summary: Star-like object, moving randomly, seems to flicker - mostly white, a little red.

content.detailedDescription:
While out walking my dog at 7 pm i noticed a orb like ball of light traveling from the west going east. this event took place just above the george washington bridge leading from ny to nj.
the amazing thing was just after the 1st appeared, a 2nd ball of light tailed it from behind a short distance. there was no shape but 2 balls of light. they were completely silent. there are constant planes flying above with 3 major airports in the area. these were not planes , helicopters or blimps.
content.summary: 2 white orbs traveling east over manhatten

content.detailedDescription:
Went out to observe the flyover of the international space station. it was due to come by at 7:24pm along with the space shuttle over scranton, pa. my wife, daughter, and i saw 2 circular, somewhat bright,starlike objets moving at an insane rate of speed, appearing to chase each other while traveling. we assumed it was the space station, checked the time, and it was 7:21pm. after pondering this for a few seconds, i realized that it couldn't have been the space station or shuttle, because of the high rate of speed. we then saw the station & shuttle fly over more to the southwest at 7:24pm and at nowhere near the same rate of speed as the first objects.
thank you!
content.summary: 2 circular starlike objects chasing each other

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside my house on my swingset at about 7:30pm, and just happened to be looking up at the stars. i firmly believe what i saw was a ufo. it not behave like any airplane i've ever seen, nor was it a meteorite.

i was facing due east, and the object - bright white at the time - came streaking across the sky directly overhead, going due east. i didn't hear any sound, and it must have been at a high altitude because it was nothing more than the size of an average star in the night sky. 

at first, i thought it was a meteorite because it was going so fast. however, then it stopped and stayed in the same position for about two seconds.

then, the object began to slowly drift to the south as it changed from white to red. the object then faded completely black, and i did not see it again.

i would estimate this event to have lasted around 5 seconds. i was not frightened at all by this experience, but simply feel - as i still do - that this was particularly weird and wanted to submit a report on it.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Shooting light, then stops, drifts to side, turns red and disappears.

content.detailedDescription: While at greyhound bus station in wytheville va i saw three orbs blinking diff colors fast  this was around 1:30 am est then i went back out side 2:00am and smoke i saw the same three  in a triangle blinking colors fast then i went back out 2:30am two was gone one was still there but look futher away this time
content.summary: Blinking light stood still

content.detailedDescription: Like i said it was there in a flash so fast i almost didnt see that it had rings around it that kept swirling around it.. it was so beautiful, absolutely magnifisent colors. it was there and i saw its rings and stared for a bit and in the next instant my visitor fled.
content.summary: It came in a flash and was gone just as quickly

content.detailedDescription:
I noticed a very bright, amber, pulsating orb.  i first noticed this orb because i pay great attention to the sky, day and night. i knew emmediately what it was.  it was what i call a "watcher." i believe these are spiritual entities, and are not related to alien activity. 

i pulled over near williams nature center on highway 68, in mankato, mn. i set up my tripod.  i videotaped it for a short while, but opted to stop filming, because i have so much footage of the orbs.  it was very close.  i would say around 125 yards at the beginning of the event.  i believe it came closer, as it flew in my direction.  i have seen thousands of these in the last six months, and have studied their behavior, only to make startling discoveries.  i thought this one was quite clear, bright, and beautifull.  my feelings while viewing this orb were nearing boredom.  i have seen and taped many much closer than this.  i have spent alot of time in the dark with a camera.  i prefer the low flyovers.  the watchers are exciting to videotape, when there is more than one in the view, and they interact.  either way, i have not lost interest, and still tape when it is clear.  i lost sight of this object, because i lost interest and looked away.  they are plentifull.
content.summary: Pulsating amber orb very bright

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my front porch talking with my neighbor when we noticed two small lights moving across the sky slowly from west to east. the second light was following the first at a distance that was too close to be airplanes, matching it's speed exactly. after about a minute, the first light went straight up and disappeared, when the second one got to the same spot in the sky it went rtaight up and disappeared also.
content.summary: Two lights move across sky, then go straight up and disappear.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving near the corner of mercer university drive & mcmanus rd. in macon, ga., headed due east, on my way to enter i-75 south. here is the exact google streeview of where i was located. http://tinyurl.Com/maconufo

i looked up and saw what resembled venus except for the fact that venus a) is lower in the sky at that time of the day and b) doesn't not set in the east and c) too bright to be venus. i do amateur astronomy and i see venus on my way out of my drive way every morning. 

so my first reaction went from , "oh , there's venus" to "now way that's venus!" within seconds.  at first i thought it may have been a reflection and while that is possible, this maintained the strong brilliance until i had to look away as i was driving.  

i was able to catch it a second time and tried my best to look for a "shape" like an airplane or jet but i could not. it was moving due north very slowly. this particular area is close to warner robins air force base and most of the time air craft has a smoke trail behind it but this did not. literally, the skies in my area are constantly littered with smoke trails every day. 

the third time i looked back at the object i could not see it.  i tried over and over to find it but it was gone.  

this object was indeed strange-looking and in particular had a very bright white light that very quickly called my attention. i'm pretty sure too that the people in the car behind me saw the same thing as they seemed to be looking up as well.
content.summary: Star/venus-like object seen due east moving slowly then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was awakened by my alarm clock. i get up and start to get my things ready to go to court. i jump in the shower and i looked outside the window to see if it was raining since it was cloudy. thats when i noticed a black oval looking object. i thought it might have been a trash bag, but it seemed to big to be a bag. i kept on looking at it trying to figure out what it could be. it moved from left to right then it started going towards the mountains. i was very excited to witness this since i've witnessed other things in the sky in the past. i kept on looking at the object and i started to loose sight of it as it kept going farther. i got out the shower and told my girlfriend about it. then i drew it on a dry erase board. i turned on the news and started watching them. i saw a story about a police helicopter that had to make an emergency stop because the emergency lights went off. i thought it might have been coincidental since i've heard that whenever theres ufos near they mess up their equipment. today(march, 8, 2011) i was watching the news and i saw a report at redondo beach about millions of dead anchovies. now i wonder if it could in fact have been a ufo or something else. hopefully there's someone else out there that saw it too,(in pomona or around pomona).
content.summary: Looked black oval blimp shape

content.detailedDescription:
The night of the 3rd i was at my friends house in carlton apartments in greenwood.  my friend calls me outside to see something in the sky. i go outside and he points towards the general area of matthews mill in greenwood. i saw what just looked like a bright light but nothing special, but it was coming in our direction. as it got closer i could see at least 4 lights and started to hear a sound. the sound can best be described as a high pitched noise sort of like a dog whistle probably between 14 and 16khz but also there was a low rumbling like distant thunder. the three of us all noted it kind of made our heads feel funny like pressure change i.E. when you drive into the mountains.
  as it got closer i noticed it had an outline like a large oval black against the night sky. as it got closer the sound got louder. i also saw what i thought might be some sort of girders or support structure on the underside of the vehicle.I am enclosing a drawing of the underside of the vehicle in this report.
 it flew in the same direction the whole time. it was definitely slower than an airplane or jet craft but faster than any lighter than air craft i am aware of. i called some friends across town that live in winter ridge apartments and they saw the same thing that the three of us saw. 
  i grew up with my dad being obsessed with military planes. i have been to many air shows at wright patterson as a child and have seen just about every kind of propulsion system in the air be it single or double bladed helicopters, jet planes blimps even stealth aircraft and this was like nothing i have ever seen.
content.summary: Low altitude flyover

content.detailedDescription:
I am a carrier for the local newspaper and was making my deliveries.  i stopped to ���porch���  one of my customers papers and looked up to the sky when i got out of my car. i saw what looked like a star moving right to left. i say it looked like a star, but it was a little brighter and a more defined circular shape than the stars around it. i immediately got the sense that this was something out of the ordinary, it obviously wasn't a star because it moved, and it wasn't a plane.

i am certain it wasn���t a plane as i see them in the night sky often and they usually have blinking red & white lights, and move in a smooth, linear motion at a constant rate of speed. the object i saw was a solid  white light that did not blink, it moved faster than what a plane would and it���s movements were not smooth, but more erratic.  it moved up, than down, then in a more or less straight line, then it made like a half circle and began to dim, as though it were moving away from me, and just disappeared.

my initial reaction was disbelief.  i am interested in the paranormal and ufo's and have always hoped i would be witness to something like this, so i didn't want my desire to color what could be a sighting of an ordinary object. however, after just a second or two, i felt certain, i knew, that what i was seeing wasn't ordinary. i stood quite still and watched the object until, as i said, it faded and disappeared.  i could hear my car radio behind me and there was no static or interference.  neither was there any interference with the car engine. i heard no sounds from the object.
content.summary: I witnessed a bright, white light moving across the night sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was on patrol in s.B. elliot park for eog resources. i went back to the trailer to use the restroom. usually the area is lit from lights attached to a generator so water trucks can see to pump water into a pond. when i stepped out, i noticed 2 star like objects moving in the clear sky. they were not blinking, flashing, or anything. they moved in perfect unison and a great speed. they were travelling north north east i believe. i watched them for about 2 min and they disappeared. while this was going on i also noticed a smaller and not as bright one moving pretty fast north west and crossed paths with the two star like objects. i tried to take a picture with my camera phone, but it was too dark. any feedback appreciated.
content.summary: 2 star like objects

content.detailedDescription: I had just gotten into the passenger side of my car, when my daughter asked why the stars were moving so fast. i opened my door and left my car, and gasped at the eastern sky.  there were two star-like objects, moving at a great rate of speed, together in perfect unison.  to my eyes, there was about a six inch span between them which was maintained the entire time they were within my view.  they were bluish-white in color, and the one on the left side was almost twice the size of the one to the right.  my daughter and i watched in awe as they raced together through the sky- not as fast as a shooting star, but much faster than anything i've ever encountered in the sky before. i called out to my husband to watch, but by the time he got to the car where he could see, they had all but disappeared behind some scraggly pines.  we drove out to the main road, where by all rights we had a better view and should have been able to pick them back up, but they were gone.  it was about 6:59pm when we saw them, and the sky was losing the last bit of color from the day.  most stars were still one with the sky, with the exception of polaris and a sliver of moon.  the entire ordeal lasted less than two minutes..It was over as abruptly as it began. just wondering if anyone else witnessed this...Or what it possibly could have been? these objects stayed together as if attached- no flashing, no blinking, no red or green lights.  something else to keep in mind.. they appeared to be moving from north to east.. across the sky (roughly southwest) was the homer city power generating station.  any feedback is appreciated.
content.summary: Two star-like objects moving across the sky in unison

content.detailedDescription: I was outside of my parents house walking to my house next door in macks creek missouri in a wooded area around 830pm and looked up at the sky through the trees i could see 3 lights in a triangle shape about 10ft apart where there are normally no lights at all. the lights always had 2 lights going at the same time in alternating patterns. all 3 lights were stantionary. lighting resembled flare guns thats what it looked like at first. at this time i ran and got my girlfriend and rest is what we witnessed together. the 3 lights bounced around in the sky for several minutes. then in the oppisite direction an airplane come flying in. and the 3 lights dissapeared. when the plane was totally gone the sky was totally black. then out of no where straight ahead of us im a clearing less then a quarter a mile away a mile in the air was a row of 50 lights side by side the size of a walmart supercenter. no sound no pressure nothing. all you could make out was the very very bright lights. it was so dark we couldnt make out any shape to the craft. then slowly it went up into the clouds. then apprx. 30 min later were heard fighters jets flying over. and my girlfriend growing up around airplanes said they were flying in a tactical manuver in the same direction that the lights left in. i was very excited during the whole thing and all i could think was this only happens in movies but my girlfriend was very freaked out by the whole thing. it is a very cloudy night with no stars or moon light.
content.summary: A row of about 50 lights a mile in the air....
